SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.levels

Class LevelParent

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.levels.LevelParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelOne, LevelSemi, LevelTwo
public abstract class LevelParent extends Object
The LevelParent class serves as an abstract base class for all game levels. It manages the game loop, actors, and scene updates.

    • LevelParent

      public LevelParent(double screenHeight, double screenWidth, String backgroundImageName, int playerInitialHealth)
      Constructs a new LevelParent instance with the specified screen height, width, background image, and player initial health.
      Parameters:
      screenHeight - the height of the screen
      screenWidth - the width of the screen
      backgroundImageName - the name of the background image
      playerInitialHealth - the initial health of the player

  • Method Details

    • initializeFriendlyUnits

      protected abstract void initializeFriendlyUnits()
      Abstract method to initialize friendly units. This method should be implemented by subclasses to add friendly units to the scene.

    • checkIfGameOver

      protected abstract boolean checkIfGameOver()
      Abstract method to check if the game is over. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define game over conditions.
      Returns:

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected abstract void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Abstract method to spawn enemy units. This method should be implemented by subclasses to spawn enemy units during gameplay.

    • instantiateLevelView

      protected abstract LevelView instantiateLevelView()
      Abstract method to instantiate the level view. This method should be implemented by subclasses to create a LevelView instance.
      Returns:
      a new LevelView instance
